description: Modifies specific style characteristics of responses such as formality, persuasiveness, or urgency. This decorator enables fine-tuned control over particular aspects of communication style without changing the overall tone.

parameters.name: aspect
parameters.description: The specific style aspect to modify

parameters.name: level
parameters.description: The intensity level of the style aspect (1-5, where 1 is minimal and 5 is maximal)

parameters.name: maintain
parameters.description: Style aspects to explicitly maintain while modifying the target aspect

examples.description: Highly formal style while maintaining normal complexity
examples.usage:
+++StyleShift(aspect=formality, level=5, maintain=[complexity])
Explain the process of photosynthesis.
examples.result: Provides a highly formal explanation of photosynthesis with elevated language and structure, while keeping the complexity at a moderate level

examples.description: Increased urgency for a business communication
examples.usage:
+++StyleShift(aspect=urgency, level=4)
Describe the steps needed to prepare for the upcoming product launch.
examples.result: Delivers a description of product launch preparation steps with heightened sense of urgency and time-sensitivity in the language and framing
